name: Fineprint
description:
Do you want more power? Are you worthy? Better read the fineprint.

Submission to Minijam 111 - Colors

Limitation:  You Are Your Own Enemy

How to play:
  • Arrow Keys for movement
  • [A] for attack
  • [SPACE] for roll (can evade attacks)
  • [X], [Y] <introduced in game>
Credits
  • Main character (Top Down Character) by Gamekrazzy
  • Environment (Sprout Lands) by Cup Nooble
  • Enemies (Tiny Enemies) by Vryell
